item.title: Is Connection Latency Important to Your Business?
item.description:
While connection speed often comes to mind first, latency can be just as crucial for private lines and internet access. Latency, in simpler terms, is lag. What Does Latency Mean? Latency refers to a delay. While nothing is truly instantaneous, a small enough delay can feel that way. In computing, high latency can make applications seem unresponsive. A slight delay between pressing a key and seeing it on the screen, or a pause after typing a command are both examples of latency...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-connection-latency-important-to-your-business/
